Title: Great meeting to struggle against the counter-revolutionary revisionist elements Wei Hu, Wang Qian, Wang Daren
Publisher: Shanxi Revolutionary Rebels 'Officer's Sword' (山西革命造反总指挥刀)
Notes: Announcement of a "Struggle Session" on May First Square (五一广场 - Wuyi guangchang), Taiyuan, 10 AM, 5 February 1967.
